net.proteusframework.users.capability

Class CapabilityDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.hibernate.dao.DAOHelper
      • net.proteusframework.users.capability.CapabilityDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean

    @Repository(value="acegi-util-capability-dao")
public class CapabilityDAO
extends DAOHelper
    DAO for Capabilities
    Author:
    Greg Dick (gdick@i2rd.com)

    • Constructor Detail

      • CapabilityDAO

        public CapabilityDAO()
        Creates a new instance.

    • Method Detail

      • capabilitiesExist

        public boolean capabilitiesExist(Object entity,
                                 EntityOperation op)
        Check if any capabilities exist for a given entity and data operation. This is useful for capabilities where access to the subject is open by default.
        Parameters:
        entity - the subject of the capability
        op - the data operation
        Returns:
        true if there are any capabilities with the given subject and operation

      • delete

        public void delete(AbstractCapability capability)
        Delete the capability.
        Parameters:
        capability - the capability

      • deleteCapabilitiesBySubject

        public <T extends AbstractCapability> void deleteCapabilitiesBySubject(Class<T> capabilityType,
                                                                       Object subject)
        Delete Capabilities
        Type Parameters:
        T - the capability type.
        Parameters:
        capabilityType - the capability type.
        subject - The subject of the capabilities. May be null to get the "all" capabilities.

      • deleteCapabilitiesForPrincipalGroup

        public void deleteCapabilitiesForPrincipalGroup(PrincipalGroup pg)
        Delete all of the capabilities that the specified principal group has. This also deletes any PrincipalGroupCapabilities that the specified groups is the subject of. Does nothing if the principal group is null.
        Parameters:
        pg - the principal group.

      • deleteCapabilitiesForPrincipalGroup

        public void deleteCapabilitiesForPrincipalGroup(@Nullable
                                                PrincipalGroup principalGroup,
                                                PrincipalGroupCapabilityOperation operation)
        Delete all of the capabilities that the specified principal group has for the specified operation. This also deletes any PrincipalGroupCapabilities that the specified groups is the subject of. Does nothing if the principal group is null.
        Parameters:
        principalGroup - the principal group.
        operation - the operation.

      • deleteDataCapabilities

        public <T,ADC extends AbstractEntityCapability<T>> void deleteDataCapabilities(Collection<ADC> caps)
        Do a batch delete of several data capabilities. This performs all of the deletes in a single transaction.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type
        ADC - capability class
        Parameters:
        caps - the capabilities

      • getAllDataFunctions

        public List<EntityFunction> getAllDataFunctions()
        Get all of the existing data functions
        Returns:
        the existing data functions

      • getCapabilitiesBySubject

        public <T extends AbstractCapability> List<T> getCapabilitiesBySubject(Class<T> capabilityType,
                                                                       Object subject)
        Get a list of Data Capabilities
        Type Parameters:
        T - the capability type.
        Parameters:
        capabilityType - the capability type.
        subject - The subject of the capabilities. May be null to get the "all" capabilities.
        Returns:
        the list of data capabilities

      • getCapabilitiesBySubjectAndOperation

        public <T> List<AbstractEntityCapability<T>> getCapabilitiesBySubjectAndOperation(Object subject,
                                                                                  EntityOperation op)
        Get a list of Data Capabilities
        Type Parameters:
        T - the entity capability type.
        Parameters:
        subject - The subject of the capabilities. May be null to get the "all" capabilities
        op - the data operation
        Returns:
        the list of data capabilities

      • getDataFunction

        public DataFunction getDataFunction(DataOperation d)
        Get a specific data function
        Parameters:
        d - the enum that represents the operation
        Returns:
        The data function, which might be disabled

      • getDataFunctionsByObjectType

        public List<EntityFunction> getDataFunctionsByObjectType(Class<?> objectType)
        Get all of the data functions that have the given ObjectType
        Parameters:
        objectType - the data object type
        Returns:
        the data functions

      • getEntityFunction

        @Nullable
public EntityFunction getEntityFunction(EntityOperation e)
        Get a specific data function
        Parameters:
        e - the enum that represents the operation
        Returns:
        The data function, which might be disabled or null if it could not be found.

      • getFunctionByProgrammaticName

        public Function getFunctionByProgrammaticName(String programmaticName)
        Get the function by programmatic name.
        Parameters:
        programmaticName - the programmatic name.
        Returns:
        the function.

      • getGroupsWithCapability

        public List<PrincipalGroup> getGroupsWithCapability(EntityOperation operation,
                                                    Object entity)
        Get the PrincipalGroups that have a capability that matches the operation and entity
        Parameters:
        operation - the data operation
        entity - the entity being protected. May be null to get Groups with the 'all' capability
        Returns:
        the PrincipalGroups

      • getPrincipalsWithCapability

        public List<Principal> getPrincipalsWithCapability(EntityOperation operation,
                                                   Object entity)
        Get the Principals that have a capability that matches the operation and entity. This will only return Principals that explicitly have the capability. It will not return Principals that are only in a group that has the capability
        Parameters:
        operation - the dataoperation
        entity - the entity being protected. May be null to get Principals with the 'all' capability
        Returns:
        the Principals

      • hasAllDataCapability

        public boolean hasAllDataCapability(Principal principal,
                                    EntityOperation operation)
        Check if a principal has full-data access for a specific operation.
        Parameters:
        principal - the principal to check.
        operation - the operation
        Returns:
        true if and only if the specified principal can do the specified operation upon on all the relevant entities.

      • hasAllDataCapability

        public boolean hasAllDataCapability(PrincipalGroup pg,
                                    EntityOperation operation)
        Check if a principal group has full-data access for a specific operation.
        Parameters:
        pg - the principal group to check.
        operation - the operation
        Returns:
        true if and only if the specified principal can do the specified operation upon on all the relevant entities.

      • hasCapabilitiesForSubject

        public boolean hasCapabilitiesForSubject(Class<? extends AbstractCapability> capabilityClass,
                                         Object subject)
        Test of any of the specified capabilities exist for the specified subject.
        Parameters:
        capabilityClass - the capability class.
        subject - the subject.
        Returns:
        true if there are capabilities and false if there are not any capabilities.

      • hasDataCapability

        public boolean hasDataCapability(Principal principal,
                                 EntityOperation operation,
                                 Object entity)
        Check if a principal has access for a specific operation upon a specific entity. Includes check for the "all data" capability hasAllDataCapability(Principal, EntityOperation).
        Parameters:
        principal - the principal to check
        operation - the operation
        entity - the entity
        Returns:
        true if and only if the principal can perform the operation on the entity.

      • hasDataCapability

        public boolean hasDataCapability(PrincipalGroup pg,
                                 EntityOperation operation,
                                 Object entity)
        Check if a principal group has access for a specific operation upon a specific entity. Includes check for the "all data" capability hasAllDataCapability(Principal, EntityOperation).
        Parameters:
        pg - the principal group to check
        operation - the operation
        entity - the entity
        Returns:
        true if and only if the principal can perform the operation on the entity.

      • save

        public void save(AbstractCapability capability)
        Delete the capability.
        Parameters:
        capability - the capability

      • save

        public void save(AbstractEntityCapability<?> capability)
        Save a capability. This does not save duplicates. Duplicates are determined by the subject, the operation, revocation flag, function override flag, and if present PrincipalGroupGrantableCapability and PrincipalGrantableCapability.
        Parameters:
        capability - the capability.

      • saveDataCapabilities

        public <T,ADC extends AbstractEntityCapability<T>> void saveDataCapabilities(Collection<ADC> caps)
        Do a batch save or update on several data capabilities. This performs all of the saves or updates in a single transaction
        Type Parameters:
        T - type
        ADC - capability class
        Parameters:
        caps - the capabilities

      • saveFunction

        public void saveFunction(Function function)
        Save a Function
        Parameters:
        function - the Function to save
